channel.title: When?
channel.description:
Are Stork & xEnt going to make a badass pk server? Don't you guys think you're a little bit late? Shit.
Almost everyone in the RSC Private Server community scene wants a PK server. A badass pking server, like the first Stork. 500+ Players online constantly, not just when events are being held. Constant Pking and Staking. I'm sick of all these servers where everyone is on the border trying to pk or all the flats are off skilling somewhere.
Srsly, do it wtf? With both of your talents you could have it done within no time.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 04, 2009, 08:09:08 pm[/size][hr]P.S. - I'm sick of all these shit servers coming up and getting good for about a month, then the Admin(s) come up with a stupid idea and just fuck everything up and everyone quits.
It's time for a complete pk server to be built.

item.title: When?
item.dc:creator: @Miles1 Miles`
item.description:
@Miles1 wrote:

There’s no way KO9 could administrate another Server. Meh, he’s barely around RSCA

Read full topic

item.description:
@Johnisriot wrote:

Exactly. Stork like or havok.

Read full topic

item.title: When?
item.dc:creator: @nacional nacional
item.description:
@nacional wrote:

yeah someone make a pk server maybe another havoc
tired of all this training and gaining items for short fun.

Read full topic

item.title: When?
item.dc:creator: @Johnisriot Johnisriot
item.description:
@Johnisriot wrote:

I been thinking the same thing. I don’t really have any server to play really until a decent PKing server is released.

Read full topic

item.title: When?
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

I’ve tried to run the idea through KO9 for an RSCA labeled PK server, the downside to that was that it would make a good amount of people leave RSCA for the pk server and piss the others off. I don’t have the resources or administrative skills to manage a successful server that your looking for (and very little around here do, i can only think of 1 which is KO9)

Read full topic
